name: Keith W. DODGSON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Dodgson v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole

parties: Keith W. DODGSON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of April, 2004, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
849 A.2d 1129
Keith W. DODGSON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 15, 2004.
